.. _`design_system_components_postinglist`:

PostingList
===========

.. figure:: images/component_postinglist.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

A user's activity stream as a list of postings including author thumbnail and attachments.
Includes controls for adding new posts and attaching media or commenting existing posts.


Related Components
------------------

:ref:`design_system_components_objectactivities`
